updates.details: ET, JDMA and NLA tape services are now available to users agin.
In preparation for scheduled maintenance on Monday morning 29 April, tape services (ET, JDMA, NLA, SD) will be taken down Thursday 25th at 16:30, but should return later on Monday.
Reports received re. CEDA archive volumes and some /gws/nopw/j04 GWS volumes. Under investigation.
Most affected hosts now rebooted and returned to queues. Further checks pending.
Many hosts out of action due to stuck jobs. Reboots required before hosts can be re-added to queues. Slow performance meanwhile.
